title: Parish News is Live
subtitle: GitHub Pages connected
body: This confirms the parish app can load news from GitHub without rebuilding.

title: Donuts & Coffee
subtitle: After the morning Masses · Parish Hall
body: Stop in for coffee and donuts after Mass. All are welcome.

title: Parish Potluck
subtitle: After the 5:00 PM Mass · Parish Hall
body: Bring a dish to share (main, side, or dessert). Paper goods and drinks provided. Everyone is welcome—invite a friend.

title: Parish Game Night
subtitle: 6:30 PM · Parish Hall
body: Board games, snacks, and fellowship. Families and individuals welcome. Bring a favorite game if you’d like.

title: No Youth Group or Confirmation
subtitle: 6:30 PM · Parish Hall
body: We hope you all have a Merry Christmas. Enjoy the Holiday season.

title: Knights of Columbus Free-Throw Competition
subtitle: 5:00 PM-7:00 PM · St. Patrick Parish Center
body: Childrens Competition. Call  Dennis Redburn for more information 620.617.2198.

title: Baptismal Preparation Classes
subtitle: 7:00 PM · St. Rose Auditorium
body: Parents and Godparents are expected to attend a 90-minute class prior to baptism. MUST RSVP

title: Back to School
subtitle: 7:50 AM–3:30 PM · School
body: After the wonderful Christmas Break we are excited to see everyone on January 5th.

title: Volunteers Always Needed
subtitle: Ongoing
body: Would you like an oppertunity to get involved or learn more about your Catholic faith? Stop by the office to see possible oppertunities to grow with Christ.
